list.text:
Shift Roster
*

A proactive web based planning tool for

Features
*

Supports up to 7 shift patterns

*

Support up to 7 sub-groups/project for shift generation

Helps in better, faster and easier planning of

*

Supports 4 different rotation policies

staffing for shift based projects

*

Export generated reports in Excel and PDF format

*

Generation of shift roster for the year in a flash

creating and managing shifts
*

*

View resource utilization based on shifts for the month
Benefits
*

Reduce shift planning overheads with increased operational
efficiency

*

Savings of 99% of time and effort

*

Minimizes risk of failure in planning

*

Available for free of cost for Cognizant engagements

https://shiftroster.cognizant.com/
www.cognizant.com | Copyright (c) 2015

list.text:
Service Now
*
*

*

*

*

ServiceNow is an On Demand IT service
and asset management solution
Offered as a hosted service and licensed
on a subscription basis
Built on a dynamic CMDB and based on
the industry standard best practices of
ITIL
Provides integrated processes for
incident, problem, change, configuration
and asset management
Service extensions are available for
employee self service, knowledge
management, service catalogue, service
level agreement management and
business analytics
Build-in reporting, notifications,
escalations, integration, graphical
mapping, workflows. etc. .

Benefits
* Based on ITIL and built on a CMDB
* Easy to use, easy to tailor and easy to maintain
* Implemented in days
* A hosted model free from maintenance fees and software to install
and manage
* Licensed on a subscription basis
* Automatically upgraded by the vendor
* Enterprise class functionality at a fraction of the cost of legacy client
server applications
Cognizant Service Now
Service Desk
*
*
*
*

Application Monitoring
Mailbox Monitoring
Batch Monitoring
Batch scheduling

*

Functional
Enhancement
Compliance &
Regulatory updates
Release Management

*
*

*
*
*
*

Incident Management
Problem Management
Change Management
Service Request

End User portal

*

Portfolio Management

Scrum based delivery

Asset Management

Knowledge Management
Service Level Management
CMDB

Reporting

Analytics

http://demo.service-now.com

www.cognizant.com | Copyright (c) 2015

4

list.text:
FINDSResolution
A Resolution Workbench platform with in-built knowledge repository and search options that seamlessly guide the
user to the most trusted recommendations. Predominantly recommended for Support functions, support portals for
self help.
Features:
 Efficient KEDB Tool with advanced search in native language

 Easy onboard: Reduce new joiners' learning time.
 Collaborative Search: The combination of Advance search and Guided navigation
approach with automatic querying capabilities
 Trusted Recommendations:

*

Comment, rate or like knowledge articles that ensures an instant feedback
mechanism and contributes to the relevant score.

*

Share updates through comments for continuous knowledge improvement.

 Enterprise integration: Safe & Seamless integration with all enterprise secured

frameworks. Bridge the gaps between different application & services by enabling the
data flow from one application to another. (integration option with Ticketing System)
 Interactive Dashboard: Get early warning
www.cognizant.com | Copyright (c) 2015

5

Return to Tools Landscape

list.text:
Service Now
*
*

*

*

*

ServiceNow is an On Demand IT service
and asset management solution
Offered as a hosted service and licensed
on a subscription basis
Built on a dynamic CMDB and based on
the industry standard best practices of
ITIL
Provides integrated processes for
incident, problem, change, configuration
and asset management
Service extensions are available for
employee self service, knowledge
management, service catalogue, service
level agreement management and
business analytics
Build-in reporting, notifications,
escalations, integration, graphical
mapping, workflows. etc. .

Benefits
* Based on ITIL and built on a CMDB
* Easy to use, easy to tailor and easy to maintain
* Implemented in days
* A hosted model free from maintenance fees and software to install
and manage
* Licensed on a subscription basis
* Automatically upgraded by the vendor
* Enterprise class functionality at a fraction of the cost of legacy client
server applications
Cognizant Service Now
Service Desk
*
*
*
*

Application Monitoring
Mailbox Monitoring
Batch Monitoring
Batch scheduling

*

Enhancement

Regulatory updates

AVM PRA Tools Catalog - Functional Model $#kem#$Landscape$#!kem#$
IT Service
Management

Engineering
Process

list.text:
DARE - Discover Ambiguous Requirements Earlier
Why DARE Tool?
A retrospection was done on the requirements for few projects in one of the
leading US insurer application are a. Resulted inferences
Ambiguous / Incomplete Requirements - ~30 to 35 % of the overall requirements
Repeated standard text/phrases in the document which resulted in
ambiguity/clarifications
Effort spent on identifying clarifications due to standard terms/phrases - ~20 to
30% of analysis effort
What?
* Need for automated scan for requirements to capture standard terms/phrases
* Quantification of Requirement Quality using a Index
Features:
*
3 levels of search with intelligence - Exact Search, Probable Search, Word
Search
*
Quantifiable score for Requirement Quality
*
Portfolio specific configuration options
*
Provision for excluding phrases / words that are not applicable for a particular
project / portfolio
*
Export to Excel feature for ambiguities identified by the tool
*
Customized reports Report based on stakeholder needs

Benefits:
* Less time for analysis - Standard ambiguous
terms/phrases can be captured in automated manner
* Based on Pilot done
* 30-50% of the ambiguity captured by the tool
* Eliminates the requirement related defect leakage
from 30 % to 10%
* Reduces effort spent on the FRD in raising ambiguous
clarifications

www.cognizant.com | Copyright (c) 2015

30 Return to Tools Landscape
